creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr Hashimoto, Wakayama
inscription: 柳さくら柳さくらの堤可な {Yanagi sakura / yanagi sakura no / tsutsumi kana} (Willow and cherry / willow and cherry— / riverbank) [Stephen Addiss]
text:
柳さくら　
柳さくらの　
堤可な
The willow and cherry, The willow and cherry
Riverbank.
title: Willow and Cherry
